name: Cube Runner 3D (IllumonTheGuy)
description:
Cube Runner 3D is a game about a cube, a cube that has to run through obstacles and complete the level or run endlessly(coming soon) for special rewards. It is somewhat a rage game too but only for the non-gamers. This game is still prototype although i do want to work on it more, suggestions are welcomed.

Its only available for windows for now but will soon be also available for android.

(The game Only Has 5 Practice Levels In the Practice Game But Will Add More Soon)
